description: The proxy service operation status change notification.
When the Operation Status of a proxy service changes,
and cspGcNotifyProxyServOperStatus is 'true'
a notification will be issued. The notification
contains the current operation status and the down
reason of the proxy service.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'The proxy service operation status is now $v1' : 'The proxy service operation status is now $v1 due to $v2'

description: The proxy service certificate expiring notification.
If the time interval cspGcPSCertExpireInterval is
positive, and cspGcNotifyPSCertExpiring is 'true', a
notification will be issued for every proxy service
certificate that will be expiring within this time
interval.
This notification is issued only once for each of
these certificates. If the interval is changed from a
positive value to 0, the proxy device will clear its
memory of notification issued in the past, and stop
issuing new notification.
The notification contains the subject name, the
serial number and the issuer name of the certificate
the serial number of the issuer's certificate,
and the end date on the certificate.

event.Summary: The proxy service certificate $v1 will expire soon

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspServCertExpiring CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspPskcCertSubjName s EXAMPLE CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspPskcCertSerialNum s EXAMPLE CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspPskcIssuerName s EXAMPLE CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspPskcIssuerCertSerialNum s EXAMPLE CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspPskcCertEndDate s EXAMPLE

description: This notification is issued on the following scenarios:
1) When the value of cpsSslActiveConnPcnt exceeds the value of
cspSslConfigHighConnPcnt
2) When the value of cpsSslActiveConn falls below the
watermark value represented by cspSslConfigWatermarkPcnt.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'SSL resource limit exceeded $v5% with $v4% of the connections used' : 'SSL resource limit fallen below $v6% with $v5%'

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSSLResourceLimitReached CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslTrapType i 1 CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslMaxConn u 9999 CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslActiveConn u 9999 CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslConfigHighConnPcnt u 9999 CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslActiveConnPcnt u 9999 CISCO-SSL-PROXY-MIB::cspSslConfigWatermarkConnPcnt u 9999
